mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Governor of Virginia, James H. Price, writes to congratulate Mr. C. Mosby Wood on being appointed Administrator of the Green Pasture Forest Recreation Area. Handwritten notes which explain the background for the letter are attached. The notes are signed by Alex B. Wood and a date of June 2007 was added in a different hand.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Governor Price to C. Mosby Wood, July 2, 1940 (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Price, James H. (James Hubert), 1878-1943
Wood, C. Mosby
African Americans -- Recreation
Receation areas
Virginia -- Green Pastures Recreation Areas
